title: OpenAI tells EU it is struggling to compete with Google as ChatGPT and Sora usage hits all time high
description: OpenAI has raised concerns with the European Commission regarding competition in the artificial intelligence sector, particularly in relation to Alphabet's Google. The company highlighted the challenges of competing with established players and called for regulatory scrutiny to ensure fair market practices.
content: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, has approached the European Commission to highlight concerns about competition in the rapidly evolving artificial intelligence sector. With more than 800 million weekly users and a recent secondary share sale pushi... [4502 chars]

title: China steps up customs crackdown on Nvidia AI chips: Report

title: AI Growth Is Outpacing Moore's Law: $500 Billion Needed Every Year To Build Data Centers, Says The Kobeissi Letter
description: The Kobeissi Letter warned that artificial intelligence compute demand is now growing at more than twice the pace of Moore's Law.
content:
On Thursday, market commentator The Kobeissi Letter warned that the global artificial intelligence boom has broken Moore's Law, with compute demand growing at twice the historical rate.
AI Demand Growing Twice As Fast As Moore's Law

title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Ask Families to Join Fight Against Predatory Social Media Policies
description: NEW YORK (AP) — Prince Harry and Meghan Markle urged parents to stand against social media companies that they said prey upon children with exploitative algorithms as the “explosion of unregulated artificial intelligence” adds to their concerns that technologies' benefits are inseparable from its dangers.

title: Soaring valuations among China’s sizzling chip, AI-related stocks test investors’ patience
description: Mirroring the US dynamic, China’s semiconductor industry is the key beneficiary of a national drive to dominate the tech landscape being shaped by artificial intelligence.
content:
China’s chip stocks have staged a world-beating rally in the past few months on the nation’s self-sufficiency push, but some investors are beginning to balk at their lofty valuations.

description: The heads of Japan’s biggest financial firms are going out of their way to assuage worries that artificial intelligence will take away jobs.

title: Senate Passes AI Chip Export Limits on Nvidia, AMD to China
description: Advanced artificial intelligence chipmakers Nvidia Corp. and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. would have to ensure US companies get priority access to their products before China under legislation the Senate passed, a setback for the industry’s efforts to block the measure.
